map_zero_apply:
theorem map_zero_apply (x : α) : ϕ 0 x = x :=
  ϕ.map_zero' x
#align map_zero_apply map_zero_apply
map_zero:
#print map_zero /-
@[simp]
theorem map_zero : ϕ 0 = id :=
  funext ϕ.map_zero'
#align map_zero map_zero
-/
map_add:
#print map_add /-
theorem map_add (t₁ t₂ : τ) (x : α) : ϕ (t₁ + t₂) x = ϕ t₁ (ϕ t₂ x) :=
  ϕ.map_add' _ _ _
#align map_add map_add
-/
is_invariant_iff_image_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem is_invariant_iff_image_eq (s : set α) : is_invariant ϕ s ↔ ∀ t, «expr '' » (ϕ t) s = s :=
  (is_invariant_iff_image _ _).trans
    (iff.intro (fun h t => Subset.antisymm (h t) fun _ hx => ⟨_, h (-t) ⟨_, hx, rfl⟩, by simp [← map_add]⟩) fun h t =>
      by rw [h t])
#align is_invariant_iff_image_eq is_invariant_iff_image_eq
is_invariant_iff_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2020 Jean Lo. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Jean Lo
-/
theorem is_invariant_iff_image : is_invariant ϕ s ↔ ∀ t, «expr '' » (ϕ t) s ⊆ s := by simp_rw [is_invariant, maps_to']
#align is_invariant_iff_image is_invariant_iff_image
is_invariant:
/-- If `τ` is a `canonically_ordered_add_monoid` (e.g., `ℕ` or `ℝ≥0`), then the notions
`is_fw_invariant` and `is_invariant` are equivalent. -/
theorem is_fw_invariant.is_invariant [CanonicallyOrderedAddMonoid τ] {ϕ : τ → α → α} {s : set α}
    (h : is_fw_invariant ϕ s) : is_invariant ϕ s := fun t => h (zero_le t)
#align is_fw_invariant.is_invariant is_fw_invariant.is_invariant
is_fw_invariant_iff_is_invariant:
/-- If `τ` is a `canonically_ordered_add_monoid` (e.g., `ℕ` or `ℝ≥0`), then the notions
`is_fw_invariant` and `is_invariant` are equivalent. -/
theorem is_fw_invariant_iff_is_invariant [CanonicallyOrderedAddMonoid τ] {ϕ : τ → α → α} {s : set α} :
    is_fw_invariant ϕ s ↔ is_invariant ϕ s :=
  ⟨is_fw_invariant.is_invariant, is_invariant.is_fw_invariant⟩
#align is_fw_invariant_iff_is_invariant is_fw_invariant_iff_is_invariant
is_fw_invariant:
theorem is_invariant.is_fw_invariant [preorder τ] [Zero τ] {ϕ : τ → α → α} {s : set α} (h : is_invariant ϕ s) :
    is_fw_invariant ϕ s := fun t ht => h t
#align is_invariant.is_fw_invariant is_invariant.is_fw_invariant
image_eq_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
theorem image_eq_preimage (t : τ) (s : set α) : «expr '' » (ϕ t) s = «expr ⁻¹' » (ϕ (-t)) s :=
  (ϕ.to_homeomorph t).to_equiv.image_eq_preimage s
#align image_eq_preimage image_eq_preimage
ext:
@[ext]
theorem ext : ∀ {ϕ₁ ϕ₂ : flow τ α}, (∀ t x, ϕ₁ t x = ϕ₂ t x) → ϕ₁ = ϕ₂
  | ⟨f₁, _, _, _⟩, ⟨f₂, _, _, _⟩, h => by
    congr
    funext
    exact h _ _
#align ext ext
continuous:
@[continuity]
protected theorem continuous {β : Type _} [topological_space β] {t : β → τ} (ht : continuous t) {f : β → α}
    (hf : continuous f) : continuous fun x => ϕ (t x) (f x) :=
  ϕ.cont'.comp (ht.prod_mk hf)
#align continuous continuous
